description: In https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/9db1642e867deb2bea54a3c1a76e52b0480cc30c we missed to provide a dict instead of None, so six.iteritems() can raise an Exception.
title: PCIDevicePool object can't be converted to a primitive if no tags are set

comments.content: In https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/9db1642e867deb2bea54a3c1a76e52b0480cc30c we missed to provide a list instead of None, so six.iteritems() can provide an Exception.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/167699
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/167699
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=267822930126e179a44830a66ab6014b46cf9e86
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 267822930126e179a44830a66ab6014b46cf9e86
Author: Sylvain Bauza <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Mar 25 18:13:59 2015 +0100

    Fix PCIDevicePool.to_dict() when the object has no tags
    
    If the object is created without specifying the tags attribute, then the
    iteration can fail.
    
    Change-Id: I092eaa70144772c8ab3b1ac76dd30e573d32f5d7
    Closes-Bug: #1436455
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
